user_request: A poem about friendship being a gift that lasts a lifetime.
final_poem:
In whispers of laughter and shared secrets we find,  
A bond like no other—the purest form of gold I've ever seen: friendship is timelessly kind.  
True friends walk with us through thick or thin streams; in their company you’d forever beam —   
With them by my side the burdens dissolve into light beams, as time weaves its endless ream— 
Their presence a constant source of solace and cheerfulness.  
Warm hugs to mend tears within your heart's searer; their laughter echoes in every prayer I hear (A)    
In the silence when fear’s whispers creep, these allies provide courage not cheap— 
They stand steadfast by my side with tender care and love —  
To face life together is a gift beyond compare.   
No matter where we roam or what trials are rife; in unity they make our spirits thrive (B)    
Laughter shared, tears to wipe away the day’s bite— 
A friendship that transcends time and strife:  
Friendship's gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
They stand by me when I falter or fall — in need of strength divine (C)    
Through every season, under heaven’s endless skies— 
To bear your burdens and embrace without a shroud:  
Friendship's gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
In trials we rise as one — in joys too when hearts are tight (D)    
Through their loyalty, I find the strength to endure— 
For them alone my heart finds solace and light;  
Friendship’s gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
A beacon through life's darkest night — when shadows do conspire (C)    
To lift me up, even as I falter or fall— 
They share the load with open arms that bind:  
Friendship’s gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
In unity they make my spirit strong; never to be denied — a friend for whom no price doth weigh heavy (D)    
With them, I find solace in their warm embrace— 
For as long enduring stars shine bright:  
Friendship’s gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
Unchained from fear's darkened spite — together they stand; within our souls we light (B)    
Through storm and sun, through loss or gain— 
Their presence in my heart will always remain:  
Friendship’s gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
A priceless bond that'll last a lifetime — their worth beyond all price (C)    
Beyond this life and time, when silence may claim; 
They are the treasure in my heart to keep:  
Friendship’s gift is such an unforeseen delight.   
In you they find me whole again—in love's embrace we bask (D)
